name: Palimpsest Grove
description:
A short, lightly interactive fiction text adventure about a man traveling through a town and getting caught up in what could be a greater mystery at the edge of Oregon in the summer of 1997.

Palimpsest Grove features technology such as text, linking pages together, and was made as an entry in the ICT Game Jam 2020: Digital Quarantine Edition with Twine 2.0.
